text: tatha svargavaasee narakavaasiyon ko pukaarenge ki hamen, hamaare paalanahaar ne jo vachan diya tha, use hamane sach paaya, to kya tumhaare paanalahaar ne tumhen jo vachan diya tha, use tumane sach paaya? ve kahenge ki haan! phir unake beech ek pukaarane vaala pukaarega ki allaah kee dhikkaar hai, un atyaachaariyon par
